com.dat257.team1.LFG.firebase

Class FireStoreHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dat257.team1.LFG.firebase.FireStoreHelper

  • public class FireStoreHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that handles the connection to the Firestore database, containing methods that fetch data or upload it to the database.

    Author: Johan Ek

      • handleJoinRequest

        public void handleJoinRequest(java.lang.String uID,
                              java.lang.String activityID,
                              boolean accept)
        Method that either accepts a join request or declines it. This is handled in a atomic transaction to avoid the possibility that the user is removed from the waiting list but not added to the participants

        Author: Johan Ek

        Parameters:
        uID - the id of the user that is requesting to join
        activityID - id of the activity that the user is trying to join
        accept - if true then the request was accepted

      • createJoinRequest

                              java.lang.String activityID)
        Method that creates a join request for a user on a certain activity.

        Author: Johan Ek

        Parameters:
        uID - the user id of the user that wants to join the activity
        activityID - the id of the activity
